item.title: A nice how-to series for writing scientific communications
item.description: How-to’s of writing scientific communications Very brief post to remind me to go back and read these in more detail! I’ve recently been asked to submit a couple of articles to Nature. One thing that seems to be an absolute must for even getting a look in to a journal such as this is a well written cover letter. Hence I went on the hunt for any tips/tricks/suggestions that were scattered around the internet.
